name: Solar System (itch) (Alastor963)
description:
This is my Solar System project I made for a Unity course. I added the following elements:
1. Mercury.
2. Venus.
3. Mars.
4. Jupiter.
5. Saturn.
6. Neptune.
7. Uranus.
8. Pluto.
9. Different rotation speeds for each planet to better represent the Solar System.

Credits:

Created by Alan Dávila.
